title: Trump White House prepares for layoffs in looming government shutdown
shortDescription: Calling Democratic spending demands 'insane,' the White House asked federal agencies to prepare for layoffs in a possible shutdown Oct. 1.

title: Trump trolls Biden with autopen stunt
shortDescription: President Donald Trump mocked Joe Biden with a display of his autopen signature at the "Presidential Walk of Fame" in the White House's West Wing.

title: Gavin Newsom fears there will be no 2028 presidential election
shortDescription: Gov. Gavin Newsom warned that the US may not see a presidential election in 2028, describing authoritarian actions by the Trump administration.

title: Trump fumes over teleprompter, escalator failures at UN
shortDescription: "This wasn’t a coincidence, this was triple sabotage at the UN," Trump said in a social media post. "They ought to be ashamed of themselves."

title: Trump, First Lady get stuck on escalator
shortDescription: An escalator at the UN General Assembly lurched to a halt just after President Donald Trump and the First Lady stepped onto it.

title: DC statue of Trump and Epstein holding hands removed, damaged
shortDescription: A protest art statue of Trump and Jeffrey Epstein holding hands was removed from the National Mall. Organizers say the park service did not warn them.

title: Newsom says he fears there will not be a 2028 presidential election
shortDescription: Gov. Gavin Newsom said he is worried there will not be a presidential election in 2028, calling the Trump administration’s actions “authoritarian.”

title: Trump taps Ben Carson as national nutriton adviser
shortDescription: Ben Carson, former HUD secretary during President Donald Trump's first term, is back in the Trump administration as the national nutrition adviser.

title: What Trump's autism announcement means for your next doctor's visit
shortDescription: Doctors will be confronted with new autism recommendations from the Trump administration's health team. Here's how this might impact your care.

title: Trump trolls Biden with White House autopen portrait
shortDescription: Presidential portraits now hang along the West Wing Colonnade. Instead of an image of Biden, there is a picture of an autopen.

title: What did Trump say about Jimmy Kimmel’s return? He 'can't believe' it
shortDescription: President Donald Trump posted on Truth Social, his equivalent of a tweet, about Jimmy Kimmel's show returning to ABC. He alluded to another lawsuit.

title: UN responds to Trump's escalator snafu as conspiracy theories spread
shortDescription: A UN investigation concluded that a videographer may have mistakenly triggered a safety function on the escalator that halted with Trump aboard.

title: Trump dismisses Jimmy Kimmel return as 'GARBAGE,' threatens inquiry
shortDescription: Trump and other conservatives blasted Jimmy Kimmel's return to television after remarks on Charlie Kirk and suggested more investigations.

title: Trump, First Lady jolt to a halt as UN escalator stops
shortDescription: President Donald Trump and the First Lady were arriving at the United Nations building in New York when they jolted as the escalator stopped.

title: DeSantis to offer Miami college land for Trump presidential library
shortDescription: Despite Trump being in presidential politics for a decade, there has been little public discussion or planning about a presidential library or museum.

title: Panic lingers after new Trump H-1B visa restrictions
shortDescription: Trump unveiled new restrictions on H-1B visas for skilled workers, which he says allow for the 'large-scale replacement of American workers.'

title: What is Trump's approval rating? Gallup poll finds Republicans souring
shortDescription: President Donald Trump continues to see historically low approval ratings. Gallup found Americans reacted strongly to Charlie Kirk's murder.

title: Democrat wins Arizona special election, shrinking House GOP margin
shortDescription: Democrat Adelita Grijalva won the Sept. 23 Arizona special election to fill the U.S. House seat left vacant by her father, Raúl Grijalva.
